description: This file is a Flutter Dart source code file defining the main entry point and UI widget for a calculator frontend app. It sets up the MaterialApp and a stateful widget displaying a loading message.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: A stateless widget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the main page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class for MyHomePage handling the build method which creates the main UI layout.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the Flutter application that runs MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, defining app layout and content.
